bike.description: Full high modulus carbon Tri/TT frame, Dyad Supreme lay-up, NACA compliant profiles, chainstay-mounted rear brake, internal cable routing, integrated seat post clamp design, seat tube with full rear wheel recess, flat-oval top tube, aerofoil seatstays, PressFit 30 BB shell, rear-entry horizontal dropouts with axle-position adjustment bolts

components.description: Windshield aero full carbon with rear-facing/enclosed front brake for reduced aerodynamic drag, with brake pad adjustment ports
American Classic Carbon 58mm series 3 clincher, 18/24, 58mm aero carbon rim, AC high-low flange Micro 58 hubs with cermanic bearings including titanium QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes.
Vittoria Open Corsa Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 electronic IRD-7970 rear and Dura Ace IFD-7970 braze-on front
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 Base Bar and Bar End Shifters, 20-Speed
Vision Trimax Carbon double with Press Fit 30, 54/42T, 172.5mm (S), 175mm (M/L), 177.5mm (XL)
Profile Design T2+ Cobra S-bend carbon fiber extensions with SVET carbon base bar, 31.8 x 400mm (S/M), 420mm (L/XL)
Profile Design Aris, 3D forged 6061 alloy, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (S/M), 100mm (L/XL)
Jamis Aero carbon post with integrated seat post clamp
Cobb Cycling V-Flow Plus with hollow cro-moly rails
